price: [ای پیامبر،] رفت و آمدِ کافران [برای تجارت] در شهرها [و مال و مقام آنان] تو را نفریبد.
arabic: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhīna kafarū fī al-bilādi
